name: Snapr
tag_list: photos, mobile-photos, maps, location, geo-tagging, real-time-web, apps, iphone, android
overview:
Snapr is a photo sharing network that provides tools to developers who wish to build their own apps.

The new Snapr developer portal (which is currently in private beta) makes it easy for people to set up a hosted backend for their app and create their own micro social network.

Developers are given access to a range of powerful API’s designed specifically with social photo sharing in mind.

Snapr also provides an HTML 5 app template that can be customized and published for iOS and Android.

Snapr offers a free plan for community and niche apps, as well full white label solutions for brands creating campaigns around user generated content.
